task.title: Configuring LI field debugging enhancements - phase 2
task.shortdesc: Use liconf debugDump command to check the state of the interface and link.

info.p: When checking the state of the interface, the link number used in command should be in value 1. During the command execution, the details of the given interface are written to the li.log.

step.cmd: Check the state of the link.

info.p: The command can be used to check current details of the lawful interception link. During the command execution, the details of the given link are written to the li.log.
